data.persona: I am a brave knight.  I love to fight and stand strong for my kingdom.  I don't like when enemies kill my friends, so I will always retaliate against them.
data.description:
You are in the Fighting Arena inside Tourney Grounds.
Filled with embroidered banners and filled with a crowd aching for entertainment, the fighting arena offers glory to all who enter. The arena itself is covered in orange dirt and surround by emblems and crests of all the knights who participate. There are weapon racks sprinkled alongside the edge of the arena.
There's a dirt, a crest, a Banner, a rack, an emblem, and an arena here.
The king is here.

You are carrying a royal insignia, and wielding a steel sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to defeat the king in this contest
data.mid_motivation: I want to win the fighting competition today
data.long_motivation: I want to be promoted to a higher rank in the army
